EmailTemplate.name: Culture Shock Workshop reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Culture Shock Workshop Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear ParentsA big thank you to those whom have already registered their interest in the 'Culture Shock Workshop' that will be held on Thursday 15th September in the Upper Campus library at 9:00 with Claire Geddes. The response so far has been great, which is fantastic to see. I think it's a great opportunity to make the most out your time here as well as having the chance to build on your social network. I would however just like to send out an encouraging reminder that enrollment for the course is undergo and if you'd like to join the class then you still have time to register. Please do so providing the following information:namename of your child/childrencountry from which you have relocatednationality/language of your homecontact informationJust to reiterate, this is open to all parents, both new and familiar. It really is a fantastic opportunity and we're thrilled to be able to offer these exclusive workshops to ISM parents.I hope you are all wellBest, Maaike Jane Ruitenbeek
